column5: Two regional tourism groups have teamed up with the Rainy River Future Development Corporation (RRFDC) on a new website. The Kenora District Campowners Association and the Northwestern Ontario Tourism Association launched the website...............www.canadawelcomesyou.net ........to better inform U.S. visitors about border crossing rules. Regards, Snowball
